definitions.definition: A domestic utensil with fibers bound together at the end of a long handle, used for sweeping .
An implement with which players sweep the ice to make a stone travel further and curl less; a sweeper .
Any of several yellow-flowered shrubs of the family Fabaceae , with long, stiff, thin branches and small or few leaves used for the domestic utensil.

subdefinitions.definition: Especially, of the tribe Genisteae , including genera Cytisus , Genista , and Spartium .
Of plants not closely related to those of tribe Genisteae .

main_definition: ( countable ) A domestic utensil with fibers bound together at the end of a long handle, used for sweeping .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , curling ) An implement with which players sweep the ice to make a stone travel further and curl less; a sweeper .
Any of several yellow-flowered shrubs of the family Fabaceae , with long, stiff, thin branches and small or few leaves used for the domestic utensil.
( slang , rare ) A firearm ; especially, a shotgun .
